cookie-settings.p: We use cookies to enhance your experience, remember your language preferences, and analyze site traffic with Google Analytics. You can accept all cookies, manage your preferences, or accept only necessary cookies.
cookie-settings.title: Cookies we use

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.p: Required for the basic functioning of the website.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.p: Remember your language preferences and interface settings.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.p: Google Analytics tracks usage to help us improve this portfolio website.

cookie-settings.span: You can change your preferences at any time.

andere-lab.title: andere lab
andere-lab.p: Rooted in graphic design, identity, it began as a personal space - free from briefs and expectations - to explore ideas through form. Over time, it evolved into a methodical lab for crafting visual systems: minimal, structured, and quietly expressive.

photo-gallery.title: Virtual Gallery of a Film Photographer
photo-gallery.p: When we set out to create this website, the goal was clear: not just to showcase stunning photography, but to build a digital space that feels like stepping into the photographer’s world.

raum-studio.title: RAUM STUDIO / R.S. / Architectural bureau
raum-studio.p: For the Berlin-based architecture firm RAUM STUDIO, we developed a new premium brand identity - one that directly communicates the studio’s values and speaks to its target audience.

xtrafit.title: XTRAFIT Gym | Сoncept
xtrafit.p: In this concept project, I carried out a redesign of the Xtrafit mobile application, which helps users improve their health and fitness results. The goal of the redesign was to enhance the user experience and visual design to make the app more intuitive, user-friendly, and aesthetically pleasing.

ace-and-tate.title: Ace & Tate | Сoncept
ace-and-tate.p: Revamped Ace and Tate's website with a fresh design, integrating user-friendly features across web and mobile. Prioritized clarity and ease of use while maintaining brand identity. Streamlined interface, enhancing browsing experience.

skills.title: Tools I Love
skills.p: Here I share the tools I use, along with a brief look at my skills, style, and approach to design.

graphic.title: Graphic Design
graphic.p: My design is the silence of form: pure structures, minimal color, and the rhythm of typography — turning visual language into a tool for storytelling.

ux.title: UX/UI Design
ux.p: I design interfaces like spaces: minimal in form, guided by logic and movement, with accents that lead the user as naturally as architecture does.

systems.title: Design Systems
systems.p: For me, a design system is more than just a set of components — it’s the logic and structure that create a cohesive brand across every level.

illustration.title: Illustration
illustration.p: I create visual stories: minimal forms, carefully placed accents, and the rhythm of composition turn each illustration into a complete narrative.

photography.title: Photography
photography.p: Architecture captured on film, where light, lines, and space turn each frame into a quiet story of form and rhythm.

typography.title: Typography
typography.p: I work with typography like the architecture of text: clean lines and well-proportioned forms that shape a visual language.

about.title: About
about.p1: I’m a graphic designer and UI/UX specialist creating branding, identity, and digital design that blends aesthetics with strategy. I work with a variety of brands, helping them build a compelling image and strengthen their competitiveness through high-quality design and strategic solutions.
